NO.1: 29520 X (6800+24000)

NO.5: 31980 X (8520+24000)

DECK CRANES: 4 X 30 MT ELECTRO HYDRAULIC CRANES WITH 4 X 12CBM GRABS
STRENGTH: TANK TOP: 24.5MT/M2 FOR HATCH NO.1,3,5, 18MT/M2 FOR HATCH NO. 2,4.

AVERAGE SPEED/CONSUMPTION
AT SEA(FULL):
BALLAST ABT 13.5KN ON ABT 28MTS LSIFO 380CST+ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
LADEN ABT 12.5KN ON ABT 29MTS LSIFO 380CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO

AT SEA(ECO):
BALLAST ABT 12.5KN ON ABT 22.0MTS LSIFO 380CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
LADEN ABT 12.0KN ON ABT 23.0MTS LSIFO 380CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO

IN PORT:
IDLE ABT 3.0MTS LSIFO 380CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORK ABT 5.0MTS LSIFO 380CST + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO

THE SPEED AND CONSUMPTION IS GIVEN BSS 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS FROM NOON TO NOON, SEA BUOY TO SEA BUOY, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS NOT EXCEEDING BF4 AND DSS 3 (SIGNIFICANT HEIGHT MAX 1.25M) WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING BALLASTING / DEBALLASTING OPERATIONS.

THE VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO BURN EXTRA LSMGO/LSIFO IN CASE OF EMERGENCY OR WHILE NAVIGATING / MANEUVERING IN NARROW / SHALLOW / RESTRICTED / CONGESTED CANALS, RIVERS, WATERS OR POOR VISIBILITY AREAS OR STANDBY, ENTERING / LEAVING PORTS / CANALS, STARTING / STOPPING THE ENGINE, BALLAST WATER EXCHANGING, CLEANING VESSEL'S HOLDS, BALLASTING/DE-BALLASTING OPERATION, OR AT LOW LOAD AND/OR BAD/COLD WEATHER CONDITION ETC.

ADA


PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
